item.name: FaceFoundConfidence
item.info: Min-Threshold; Floating point in range [0,1]; default=0.50

item.name: OnlyOneFaceConfidence
item.info: Min-Threshold; Floating point in range [0,1]; default=0.90

item.name: EyesFoundConfidence
item.info: Min-Threshold; Floating point in range [0,1]; default=0.50

item.name: EyesOpenConfidence
item.info: Min-Threshold; Floating point in range [0,1]; default=0.65

item.name: UniformLightingConfidence
item.info: Min-Threshold; Floating point in range [0,1]; default=0.50

item.name: FrontalPoseConfidence
item.info: Min-Threshold; Floating point in range [0,1]; default=0.50

item.name: InterEyesDistance
item.info: Min-Threshold; Pixels; integer in range [0,IMAGE_SIZE_LIMIT]; default=90

item.name: PoseAngleRoll
item.info: Range-Threshold [-Th,Th]; Degrees from vertical; integer in range [0,~45]; default=15

item.name: ProcessingTimePerFrame
item.info: Max-Threshold (in milliseconds); Float in range [0,MAX_FLOAT]; default=142 (i.e. 7fps)

item.name: GlobalFaceQuality
item.info: Min-Threshold; Floating point in range [0,1]; default=0.60

item.name: MinFaceDetectionSize
item.info: Minimum face detection size relative to the absolute minor dimension of the image; Floating point in range [0,1]; default=0.20
